title: Insomnia eSports LF Coach & Possible Manager
body:
Hi guys, 

We're Insomnia eSports formerly known as Nurse Joy Team 2, we've broken off into our own team as we are showing real progress lately
and we're challenging some of the top teams and making a lot of progress with it.

Currently we're looking for a coach, possibly a manager if you are interested, we've done well in the first 2 weeks of OOL.
We had to sub our top laner for week 1 and unfortunately only gained 10 points and didn't make day 2
However this week we made it to Day 2 and played against "Aesthetics" who we believe we did well against, we put up a great fight
and we were even in kills but down heavily in objectives we're looking to really take our team to the next step as individually we all
are great players but we're lacking in rotations and some other things a coach could improve on. Also our players are acting as managers too which 
strains us all and a manager could help relieve some of those duties.

Thanks guys, please shoot me or POLO an add on league or discord!
:)

League: Vicenza
Discord: Vicenza#2714

League: Ninja POLO Shirt
Discord: Ninja POLO#5795
